Residue¶

class src.residue.Residue(name)[source]¶
class Residue¶

This class groups informations about a residue.

name¶

Name of the residue (1 letter code)

Type:str
ca_coords¶

3D coordinates of the residue

Type:Numpy array
calculate_distance(residue)[source]¶

Calculate Euclidian distance between two residues with THE most efficient method.

Math:distance = sqrt{(x_a-x_b)^2+(y_a-y_b)^2+(z_a-z_b)^2}
Parameters:residue (object) – An object of the Residue class.
Returns:The calculated distance.
Return type:dist (float)
